topRisks: Accessibility compliance limited to key workflows
Lack of explicit documentation on UI contrast ratios
nextActions: Verify WCAG contrast compliance for the web UI
Schedule a technical deep-dive on data retention settings
proofNotes: All requirements mapped to the Capability Brief
Partial statuses assigned where documentation was incomplete
Proof verifier checks evidenceQuotes against the Capability Brief text (normalized matching; ellipsis wildcard supported).
The "Evidence mismatch" flag is verifier-owned and is only added/removed by the proof verifier.
Proof totals count unpaired evidence IDs (IDs without quotes) as unverified references (conservative scoring).

requirements.text: The system shall support volunteer registration with configurable form fields.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster provides web-based volunteer registration with configurable form fields. It includes validation for required and optional fields.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster provides web-based volunteer registration with configurable form fields.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to create events and define shifts with capacity limits.
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinators can create events and define shifts with capacity limits. This ensures shift coverage is managed effectively.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinators can create events and define shifts with capacity limits.

requirements.text: The system shall allow volunteers to sign up for shifts and receive confirmations.
requirements.responseSummary: Volunteers can self-signup for available shifts and receive automated email confirmations.
evidenceQuotes: volunteers can self-signup for available shifts
Automated email confirmations and reminders are supported

requirements.text: The system shall send automated reminders 24 hours and 2 hours before a shift via email.
requirements.responseSummary: The system supports automated email reminders with configurable schedules, specifically including 24-hour and 2-hour intervals.
evidenceQuotes: reminders are supported with configurable schedules (e.g., 24h, 2h).

requirements.text: The system shall support optional SMS reminders (if enabled by the organization).
requirements.responseSummary: SMS reminders are supported via integration with a third-party provider. The organization must provide their own SMS account for this functionality.
evidenceQuotes: SMS reminders are not included by default; integration is possible via a third-party SMS provider
gapsOrQuestions: Which third-party SMS providers are supported?
Is there an additional cost for the integration setup?

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to mark attendance and record no-shows.
requirements.responseSummary: Attendance tracking is supported for each shift, including notes and the ability to mark no-shows.
evidenceQuotes: Attendance tracking is supported for each shift, including notes and no-show marking.

requirements.text: The system shall maintain a volunteer profile including languages, skills, certifications, and availability.
requirements.responseSummary: Volunteer profiles support skills, language preference, certifications, and availability notes.
evidenceQuotes: Volunteer profiles support skills, language preference, certifications, and availability notes.

requirements.text: The system shall support role-based access (Admin, Coordinator, Volunteer).
requirements.responseSummary: Role-based access is supported with specific roles for Admin, Coordinator, and Volunteer.
evidenceQuotes: Role-based access is supported with Admin, Coordinator, and Volunteer roles.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a bilingual messaging option (English/Spanish) for templates.
requirements.responseSummary: Messaging templates can be authored in both English and Spanish, allowing coordinators to choose the language per send.
evidenceQuotes: Messaging templates can be authored in English and Spanish; coordinators can choose the template language per send.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a dashboard showing volunteer counts, shift fill rates, attendance, and hours.
requirements.responseSummary: Dashboards include volunteer counts, fill rates, attendance rates, and volunteer hours by event.
evidenceQuotes: Dashboards include volunteer counts, fill rates, attendance rate, and volunteer hours by event.

requirements.text: The system shall support CSV export of volunteer rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.
requirements.responseSummary: CSV export is supported for rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.
evidenceQuotes: CSV export is supported for rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to broadcast announcements to selected volunteer segments.
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinators can broadcast announcements to volunteer segments based on skill and language preference.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinators can broadcast announcements to volunteer segments (by skill and language preference).

requirements.text: The system shall provide a basic audit log of coordinator actions.
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinator actions are recorded in an audit log, including event creation, editing, and message sends.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinator actions are recorded in an audit log (event creation/editing and message sends).

requirements.text: The system shall support data retention settings for inactive volunteer records.
requirements.responseSummary: Data retention rules can be configured for inactive volunteers based on the organization's chosen period.
evidenceQuotes: Data retention rules can be configured for inactive volunteers (organization chooses retention period).

requirements.text: The system shall provide accessibility considerations for web UI (keyboard navigation and readable contrast).
requirements.responseSummary: The platform includes keyboard navigation for key workflows, though specific contrast ratios are not documented.
evidenceQuotes: UI supports mobile browsers and includes keyboard navigation for key workflows.
gapsOrQuestions: Does the UI meet WCAG 2.1 AA contrast standards?
Are all administrative pages accessible via keyboard?

requirements.text: The platform shall be accessible via modern browsers on desktop and mobile.
requirements.responseSummary: The UI supports modern browsers and is optimized for mobile browser access.
evidenceQuotes: UI supports mobile browsers

requirements.text: The platform shall support at least 2,000 registered volunteers.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster is designed to support up to 5,000 volunteers on a standard deployment.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster is designed for organizations up to ~5,000 volunteers on standard deployment.

requirements.text: The platform shall provide basic error handling and clear user guidance.
requirements.responseSummary: The system provides form validation for registration, but broader error handling documentation is limited.
evidenceQuotes: configurable form fields with required/optional validation.
gapsOrQuestions: Can you provide examples of error messages for invalid data entry?
Is there a help documentation portal for volunteers?

requirements.text: The platform shall ensure that exported data can be downloaded without additional tools.
requirements.responseSummary: Data is exported in CSV format, which is a standard format accessible without specialized software.
evidenceQuotes: CSV export is supported

proposalOutline.executiveSummary: MatrixMint proposes ReliefRoster to modernize RapidRelief Network's volunteer coordination, offering a scalable, bilingual solution that automates scheduling and reporting. Our solution directly addresses the need for reduced onboarding time and improved reliability through automated reminders and robust tracking.
evidenceVerificationNotes: All functional and non-functional requirements were cross-referenced with the ReliefRoster Capability Brief.
Three requirements were identified as Partial due to third-party dependencies or missing documentation details.
